Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
MOVVA Tech, founded in 2018 and headquartered in Shanghai, specializes in AI+CG virtual technology.

Led by Dr. Chai Jinxiang, the company brings together top global talent in computer vision and graphics.

Its core technology offers full-stack virtual human solutions, including modeling, animation, and AI-driven interaction.

AI-powered motion capture cuts costs by 90% while automating facial/body animations.

It provides high-fidelity virtual avatars for industries like e-commerce, education, and finance.

MOVVAâ€™s virtual live-streaming tools enable real-time multilingual interactions for digital marketing.

Its patented tech has won awards like ACM SIGGRAPH and holds dozens of IP rights.

Backed by investors (e.g., Sequoia China, Morningside), it raised $130M in Series B funding.

Partners include Tencent and ByteDance, scaling metaverse content production.

MOVVA aims to build foundational infrastructure for seamless virtual-real integration.
